source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_00<tab>Wheiskaet would first like to verify that you are not a complete fraud.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_00<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルのヴェイスケートは、本番の前の肩慣らしをさせたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_01<tab>Before he bothers giving you a truly demanding task, Wheiskaet would first have you attend to a simple one. Place the herring he has given you on an eastern cape near Costa del Sol to lure out the nix that has been seen in the vicinity.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_01<tab>ゲゲルジュからの依頼に取りかかる前に、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207B801 /var>を倒すよう指示された。「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C7301 /var>」に 「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FC01 /var>」を仕掛けよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_02<tab>Having baited the trap with your herring, all that remains is to wait for and slay the nix that comes forth to claim it.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8ECF01 /var>で待機し、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207B801 /var>」を倒して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FD01 /var>」を入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_03<tab>You dispatch the slimy creature with great fanfare and sever one of its legs as proof of your kill. Show Wheiskaet that the deed is done.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207B801 /var>を倒し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FD01 /var>を手に入れた。コスタ・デル・ソルの「ヴェイスケート」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_04<tab>Wheiskaet explains that a recent incident with a former employee has forced him to treat strangers with greater caution. Having proven yourself to be nothing like that other poor, unfortunate soul, he is now willing to give you a challenge as befits your talents.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_SEQ_04<tab>ヴェイスケートは、冒険者の力が偽物ではないとわかってくれた。さぁ、ゲゲルジュの依頼を開始しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_00<tab>Use the herring to lure out the nix.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C7301 /var>に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FC01 /var>を仕掛ける

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_01<tab>Lie in wait for the nix.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8ECF01 /var>で待機し<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207B801 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FD01 /var>を入手

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the nix leg to Wheiskaet.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_TODO_02<tab>ヴェイスケートに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FD01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_000<tab>Master Gegeruju's requests can be more demanding than you realize. Before I set you to your true task, I would like to verify that this won't be a waste of my time.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_000ゲゲルジュの旦那からの依頼は、簡単なもんじゃない。
本番の前に、肩慣らしと行こうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_001<tab>A nix has recently been seen prowling the beach to the east. As you can imagine, my master does not want large slimy creatures anywhere near his lands.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_001最近、西から流れてきたが、
海辺の魚を食い荒らして、旦那が気になさっている。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_002<tab>The beast is cunning, but you should have no difficulty luring it out with herring.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_002このを海岸に仕掛け、
食らいついたを倒してこい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_003<tab>Slay the nix and return to me. Oh, and don't forget to bring me a leg as proof of the kill.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_003そうだな……お前が倒した証拠に、
でも、持ってきてもらおうか。
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_010<tab>指定地点に餌を置くと、<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207B801 /var>が沸くので倒す（ギガントードの肉ゲット）

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_020<tab>Well? Did you deal with the nix?
target: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_020<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86FD01 /var>は、持ってこれたんだろうな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_025<tab>Lest you think me overly cautious for testing you in this way, you should know that we had an incident not long ago. A foolish young employee was dismissed for lying about his past. He claimed to have served in the Company of Heroes, but I knew for a fact he did not.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_025……なるほどな。
お前の「力」が偽物でないことはよくわかった。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_026<tab>Anyway, now that the pointless busywork is finished, I shall give you a challenge as befits your talents.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_WHEISKAET_000_026では、ゲゲルジュの旦那からの依頼を伝えよう。
今みたいな簡単な仕事とは、わけが違うぞ。
……チビって逃げるなよ？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB005_00812_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>Ripples in the water catch your eye...
